name: Journalism class: PART 2
description:
Ashley and the Jillian begins to investigate the dismissal of the swim coach Wilders. Find out in this part of the novel:
- how the investigation is proceeding;
- will they be able to work in a team?;
- at what stage is the relationship between the girls.Features
  • The second part of novel;
  • А story full of emotions;
  • Story that will branch according to your "choice";
  • Many characters in one story;
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements.
